data.comment: Today's referee, Johann Hamel, has blown to start the match.
PSG take a 1-0 lead thanks to Moise Kean.
In the minute 3, Great play from Mitchel Bakker to set up the goal.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Moise Kean's header is off-target for PSG.
In the minute 5, Johann Hamel awards Dijon a goal kick.
Throw-in PSG.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 7, In Paris, Mama Balde (Dijon) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
PSG are on the attack at Parc des Princes, where Neymar is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 10, PSG's Neymar misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
PSG are pushing forward but Colin Dagba's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, Dijon have a goal kick.
Dijon push upfield but Johann Hamel quickly pulls them for offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Neymar.
In the minute 14, PSG's Neymar looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to PSG.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for PSG close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
In Paris Dijon attack through Eric Ebimbe. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 20, Johann Hamel awards PSG a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Dijon.
It's now 2-0 in Paris as Moise Kean scores for PSG.
Neymar with an assist there.
In the minute 25, PSG will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dijon.
Bruno Ecuele for Dijon drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 28, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In Paris PSG drive forward through Pablo Sarabia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 30, Can PSG capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Dijon.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
Dijon's Mama Balde breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
In the minute 41, Dijon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Dijon close to the penalty box.
Wesley Lautoa of Dijon gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, PSG have a goal kick.
Pablo Sarabia (PSG) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Dijon.
Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for PSG in the half of Dijon.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
At Parc des Princes, Moussa Konate has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of PSG.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, PSG advance rapidly upfield but Johann Hamel blows for offside.
PSG's Neymar gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
PSG to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
In the minute 50, Moise Kean for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to PSG just outside Dijon's area.
In the minute 52, PSG drive upfield and Neymar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dijon defender.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dijon's half?
In the minute 55, Pape Diop is on a sub for Wesley Lautoa for Dijon.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
PSG drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 58, Eric Ebimbe (Dijon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Eric Ebimbe of Dijon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The home team replace Julian Draxler with Ander Herrera.
In the minute 60, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to PSG.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of PSG.
In the minute 64, Free kick Dijon.
Free kick Dijon.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Johann Hamel signals a PSG throw-in in Dijon's half.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 69, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jonathan Panzo (Dijon) gets a yellow card.
The away team have replaced Moussa Konate with Bersant Celina. This is the second substitution made today by Stephane Jobard.
In the minute 72, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Thomas Tuchel (PSG) is making a second substitution, with Kays Ruiz Atil replacing Marquinhos.
Kylian Mbappe is replacing Moise Kean for PSG at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 74, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Dijon are coming forward and Mama Balde gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
In the minute 76, PSG's Neymar is on target but unsuccessful.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 79, PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stephane Jobard is making the team's third substitution at Parc des Princes with Chafik replacing Sacha Boey.
In the minute 80, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to PSG.
Aurelien Scheidler is replacing Mama Balde for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
Neymar for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Johann Hamel awards Dijon a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
PSG take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Kylian Mbappe.
That's a fine assist from Neymar.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Dijon.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bandiougou Fadiga is replacing Rafinha for the home team.
In the minute 86, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Great finish from Kylian Mbappe to give PSG a 4-0 lead.
Pablo Sarabia instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Dijon in the half of PSG.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
At Parc des Princes the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
